text: The Bishop Heber College Library would conduct a free workshop on ‘How to write book reviews,’ with assistance from the National Book Trust in the first week of March. It workshop would include components such as writing skills, creative writing and scientific writing. About 25 students of the college and 15 students from other colleges can participate. Jesudoss Manalan, college librarian, and R.Selvaraj, assistant professor, Library and Information Science of the college would be coordinators of the workshop. Students from other colleges could participate by applying to the Principal, Bishop Heber College, with a recommendation letter from the Principal of their institutions, D.Paul Dhayabaran, Principal, Bishop Heber College, said in a press release.
title: Free workshop
